title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta or bacon with garlic until crispy.
Beat eggs and mix with grated Parmesan cheese.
Drain spaghetti and combine immediately with egg-cheese mixture.
Add pancetta and mix well. Season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until golden.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and add the cooked chicken.
Simmer for another 5-10 minutes and garnish with coriander.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy dish made with colorful vegetables and soy sauce.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a large pan or wok.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce and toss well.
Serve immediately over rice or noodles.
